items.text: too full on the pads, flicked to deep midwicket
items.shortText: Duminy to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: leading edge but falls short. Turned the bat face too early
items.shortText: Duminy to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: fired full outside off, Mushfiqur gives himself some room and belts this through extra cover. Weight transferred fully forward as he blasted this. Terrific timing
items.shortText: Duminy to Mushfiqur Rahim, FOUR runs

items.text: bunts this length delivery to extra cover
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: rides the bounce and steers this behind the stumps, wide of backward point
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: pulled, took his eyes off, but was hitting it along the ground to deep square
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: slower and fuller on the stumps, check-driven to short cover
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: squeezes this drive to mid-off, wanted a single but that would've been steeped with risk
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: top-edges the pull, no one at fine leg. Brave from Shakib to take him on. Brings up his fifty and The Oval roars. Scores and scores of Bangladeshi fans in the crowd wave the flag. This has been a very sensible knock
items.postText: Murugan Muthukr: "My prediction - Bangladesh will score 350+ and SA will chase it down with De Kock scoring a century!"
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.preText: Azweer: "Ngidi left after bowling 4 overs, Markram & Duminy combined and bowled 5 overs so far. So it's almost certain that Ngidi might not be back into the field tonight.." -- If it's a hamstring, it's hard to see him come back. More woes for them then. Hopefully Steyn's ready for the next game
items.text: runs this down to third man
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: angling into middle and leg, tucked to deep square
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: controlled pull down to fine leg, on the bounce to the fielder
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: overbalanced as he's hit on the pad trying to play across the line, saved by an inside edge
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: cut hard but straight to point
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: scintillating pull, down to deep square. Picked the length early and went through with the stroke
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: dismissed from his sight! Length outside off and Shakib heaved this across the line into the vacant wide long-on region
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, FOUR runs

items.text: squeezes this yorker-length delivery to point
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, no run

items.text: climbs into this pull, down to deep square. Fifth century stand for these two in ODIs
items.shortText: Morris to Shakib Al Hasan, 1 run

items.text: slower and fuller on middle and leg, tucked to square leg
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: slips this length ball down leg, good take. Zipped through to QDK
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 wide

items.text: hops back and nudges this short of length delivery to square leg
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: pulled along the ground to fine leg
items.postText: Shahrukh Hayat: "Bangladesh is proving that you dont need hard hitting and hit sixes to keep up with the modern run-rate requirements. All you need is TIMING & PLACEMENT and execute it with CLASS"
items.shortText: Morris to Mushfiqur Rahim, 1 run

items.text: slower and fuller outside off, defended from the crease
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: nearly chopped on! Looking to cut, no room, thin inside edge on the bounce to the keeper.
items.postText: ESPNcricinfo's Forecaster predicts Bangladesh to get 334 from here
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run

items.text: dabs with soft hands, rode the bounce nicely
items.shortText: Phehlukwayo to Mushfiqur Rahim, no run
